name: Togepi & Cleffa & Igglybuff GX

attacks.name: Rolling Panic
attacks.effect: Flip a coin until you get tails. This attack does 30 more damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Supreme Puff GX
attacks.effect: Take another turn after this one. (Skip the between-turns step.) If this Pokémon has at least 14 extra {Y} Energy attached to it (in addition to this attack’s cost), your opponent shuffles all of their Benched Pokémon and all cards attached to them into their deck. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)

rule_box: When your TAG TEAM is Knocked Out, your opponent takes 3 Prize cards.
